navItems.description: Brief introduction into the history of HTML and why we use it.

HTML is the structure of a webpage. Lets learn the essential elements and basic structure of a web page by creating a Hello World page.

This is a common first exercise when learning any programming language. Below you'll notice the code sample of our page and the tags that make up this very basic page.
Tags give meaning to the content. They also give us functionality and style.
Forms allow us to send information and communicate with a web site.
HTML5 introduces us to new features, tags and fun!
Test, Test, Test! Make sure your web page works for everyone!
